name: Annastasia
description:
/!\ This game is not suitable for children and sensitive people /!\

"We need you and your expertise." - Annastasia

Hello, soldier!
The game is now available!!!

Embody a mercenary specializing in curative alchemy who will team up with experienced people to track down a typically brutal and vicious ogre (An ogre from Malagasy folklore).
You will face difficulties and your choices will impact the progress of the story throughout the game.
I think the screenshots speak for themselves.

Language: French

If you love the game, don't hesitate to support me on my patreon: https://www.patreon.com/ramosetsimbina

Enjoy!
